item.title: [‚≠ê] Files Events Monitor
item.description: Are you concerned about the integrity and security of your files? Do you want to keep track of any changes or activities in a specific directory? Introducing Files Events Monitor, a simple yet powerful tool to monitor file system activity and receive real-time alerts via Discord webhook. Files Events Monitor is a Python-based command-line tool designed to keep a vigilant eye on your specified directory for any file system events.
